EmailTemplate.name: 2018 - EMEAI HON Operators Conference.201801_EMEAI_Confirmation_HONOperatorConf_
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: Honeywell Operators Conference in Prague - Jan 30 & 31
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the Honeywell Operators Conference in Prague. Event: Honeywell Operators Conference
Date:
- Tuesday, 30th January
- Wednesday, 31st January
- (You are {{lead.Option 1 or 2:default=attending day 1, day 2}})
Location: Boscolo Prague, the Marriott Hotel <[[http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/prgak-boscolo-prague-autograph-collection/]]> Senovazne namesti 13/991 Prague 110 00 Czech Republic
View conference agenda <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Operators_Conference_Prague.html]]>.
Please contact us at Anna.Tomova@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Anna.Tomova@honeywell.com]]> with any questions.
We look forward to meeting you during our event.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
